problem.markdown:
>>Which two actions unhide a worksheet in a workbook?<<
[x] Right-click a worksheet tab, and click Unhide. [ ] Right-click anywhere in the worksheet, and click Unhide. [x] On the Home tab, click Format in the Cells group, select Hide & Unhide, and click Unhide Sheet. [ ] On the Page Layout tab, select View in the Sheet Options group.
[explanation] The correct answer is the first and third option. [explanation]
